returns._0: bytes32[] Array of all protocol IDs
protocolId Protocol identifier (bytes32(0) if not found)
bytes32[] Array of protocol IDs owned by the address
bool True if URL is registered

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.bountyTerms: JSON string of bounty terms (will be hashed)

returns.protocolId: Unique identifier for the registered protocol

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getProtocolCount().notice: Get total number of registered protocols

getProtocolIdByGithubUrl(string).notice: Get protocol ID by GitHub URL

isGithubUrlRegistered(string).notice: Check if a GitHub URL is already registered

updateBountyPool(bytes32,uint256).notice: Update total bounty pool for a protocol
